locality: Andringitra, Camp IV, ca. 38 km S of Ambalavao, Andringitra Reserve on ridge above headwaters of Sahavatoy River. Montane forest with Podocarpus, Phillipia, Symphonia, Weinmannia, Medinilla. Canopy height 4-5 m, changing to open, ericaceous vegetation. Collected with J. Raharilala, P.J. Rakotomalaza, M. Andrianarisata & J. McDonagh.
Ambatovy - Andranovery. Dense forest on level ground.
